resources.string: I opened myself to all of my feelings, the good and the bad
When something upsetting came up, I tried very hard to stop thinking about it
I paid close attention to what I was thinking and feeling
Most of the time, I was just going through the motions without paying much attention
I carried myself through tough moments by seeing my life from a larger viewpoint
I told myself that I shouldn\'t be thinking or feeling the way I was
I was able to let negative feelings come and go without getting caught up in them
When I had negative thoughts or feelings, it was very hard to see past them
I was very in touch with what is important to me and my life
I didn\'t usually have time to focus on the things that are really important to me
Even when things got tough, I was still able to take steps toward what I value in life
Getting upset left me stuck and inactive
You have __ questions left. You can finish now or later.
